resources.string: This is a sample description of a medication. It has multiple sentences and covers multiple lines.
You already took this dose\nI hope you didn\'t take it again
The medication will be permanently deleted

v%1$s by Noah Stanford (aka CorruptedArk)

Did I Take My Meds? is a FOSS app to keep track of medications
Did I Take My Meds? is designed to help prevent a user from skipping doses and/or overdosing
Copyright Â© 2021 Noah Stanford noahstandingford@gmail.com

Google doesn\'t allow developers to place donation links in apps to support themselves if they are not tax exempt charities. If you still want to support me, you can find CorruptedArk on Liberapay in a separate browser. My GitHub repository is a good place to start.
